name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Son of a peach!: Offensive Word Replacer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace offensive words in your browser with similar sounding but harmless words Eg. Holy Shirt, What the fork?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No more having to turn off the projector as the teacher when you search the web. All of the 623 offensive words from the naughty word list are magically replaced with far nicer disney like terms.
 
Examples:
- Was that just..oh it says "get the fork out of my way".
- Did I just see.. no it says "that bull shirt".
- Did that just say... wait no it says that guys "a total ash bowel".
